allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT period_start, co2e_emissions, scope FROM metrics_data WHERE organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'' AND period_start >= ''2023-01-01'' AND period_start < ''2023-02-01'' ORDER BY period_start LIMIT 10;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT id, name, baseline_value, target_value, current_emissions, baseline_year, target_year FROM sustainability_targets WHERE organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT period_start, co2e_emissions, scope FROM metrics_data WHERE organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'' AND period_start >= ''2025-01-01'' AND period_start < ''2025-02-01'' ORDER BY period_start LIMIT 10;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT id, name, baseline_year, baseline_emissions, target_year, target_emissions, current_emissions FROM sustainability_targets WHERE organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT metric_id) as total_metrics FROM metrics_data WHERE organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM period_start) = 2025;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT name, baseline_year, baseline_value, target_year, target_value, current_emissions, status FROM sustainability_targets WHERE organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as metric_targets_count FROM metric_targets WHERE organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'' AND target_id IN (SELECT id FROM sustainability_targets WHERE organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'' AND target_type = ''near-term'');")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT mc.name, mt.baseline_emissions, mt.target_emissions, mc.unit FROM metric_targets mt JOIN metrics_catalog mc ON mt.metric_catalog_id = mc.id WHERE mt.organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'' AND mt.target_id = ''d4a00170-7964-41e2-a61e-3d7b0059cfe5'' ORDER BY mt.baseline_emissions DESC LIMIT 5;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT id, name, target_type FROM sustainability_targets WHERE organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT DISTINCT mc.category, COUNT(*) as count FROM metric_targets mt JOIN metrics_catalog mc ON mt.metric_catalog_id = mc.id WHERE mt.organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'' AND mt.target_id = ''d4a00170-7964-41e2-a61e-3d7b0059cfe5'' AND mt.status = ''active'' GROUP BY mc.category ORDER BY count DESC;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT mc.name, mc.category, mc.scope, mt.baseline_emissions, mt.target_emissions, mt.current_emissions, mt.status FROM metric_targets mt JOIN metrics_catalog mc ON mt.metric_catalog_id = mc.id WHERE mt.organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'' AND mt.target_id = ''d4a00170-7964-41e2-a61e-3d7b0059cfe5'' AND mc.category IN (''Water Withdrawal'', ''Water Discharge'', ''Water Consumption'');")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -d postgres -c "SELECT DISTINCT category FROM metrics_catalog WHERE scope IN (''scope_1'', ''scope_2'', ''scope_3'') ORDER BY category;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.code, m.name, m.category, m.scope, COUNT(DISTINCT md.id) as data_points, SUM(md.value) as total_value, SUM(md.co2e_emissions) as total_emissions FROM metrics_catalog m JOIN metrics_data md ON m.id = md.metric_id WHERE md.organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'' AND (md.value > 0 OR md.co2e_emissions > 0) GROUP BY m.id, m.code, m.name, m.category, m.scope ORDER BY m.category, m.name;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as replanning_count FROM target_replanning_history WHERE organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT assurance_level FROM ghg_inventory_settings WHERE organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'' LIMIT 1;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT DISTINCT mc.category, mc.name, mc.code, COUNT(md.id) as data_points, SUM(md.value) as total_value FROM metrics_catalog mc LEFT JOIN metrics_data md ON mc.id = md.metric_id AND md.organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'' WHERE mc.category IN (''Electricity'', ''Purchased Energy'', ''Stationary Combustion'', ''Mobile Combustion'') GROUP BY mc.id, mc.category, mc.name, mc.code ORDER BY mc.category, mc.name;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT DISTINCT mc.category, mc.name, mc.code, COUNT(md.id) as data_points, SUM(md.value) as total_value FROM metrics_catalog mc LEFT JOIN metrics_data md ON mc.id = md.metric_id AND md.organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'' WHERE mc.category IN (''Water Withdrawal'', ''Water Discharge'', ''Water Consumption'') GROUP BY mc.id, mc.category, mc.name, mc.code ORDER BY mc.category, mc.name;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT DISTINCT mc.category, mc.name, mc.code, COUNT(md.id) as data_points, SUM(md.value) as total_value FROM metrics_catalog mc LEFT JOIN metrics_data md ON mc.id = md.metric_id AND md.organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'' WHERE mc.category = ''Waste'' GROUP BY mc.id, mc.category, mc.name, mc.code ORDER BY mc.name;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD="MG5faEtcGRvBWkn1" psql -h aws-0-eu-central-1.pooler.supabase.com -p 6543 -U postgres.yrbmmymayojycyszUnis -c "SELECT mc.name, mc.category, SUM(md.value) as total_value, mc.unit, mc.is_renewable FROM metrics_catalog mc JOIN metrics_data md ON mc.id = md.metric_id WHERE md.organization_id = ''22647141-2ee4-4d8d-8b47-16b0cbd830b2'' AND mc.category IN (''Electricity'', ''Purchased Energy'', ''Stationary Combustion'', ''Mobile Combustion'') AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM md.period_start) = 2025 GROUP BY mc.id, mc.name, mc.category, mc.unit, mc.is_renewable ORDER BY mc.category, mc.name;")
